name: Pumpkin Curse
description:
Joey is an ordinary kid with a sweet tooth.

While he was out trick-or-treatin' on Halloween, his body was transformed by an ancient curse: the Pumpkin Curse! Even Death cannot break the Curse - he shall rise from the grave, stronger than before. But beware: dying makes Joey lose some of his beloved candy.

Now, he must unleash the power of his all-new Pumpkin Head to its fullest in order to return home!

--------------------

Keyboard:

Arrow keys - movement
Space - jump
Ctrl - shoot Pumpkin Head
Z - change weapon

XBOX Controller:

Left joystick - movement

A - Jump

X - shoot Pumpkin Head

B - change weapon

--------------------

A game made in 62 hours for the Home of Nerds Game Jam.
